ISSUE.TITLE: Product record is hard-deleted from database if deleted from product list
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.70 Steps to reproduce the problem: - go to catalog -> products in admin section - select a product (write down its id) - click on red button 'Delete selected' and confirm Expected outcome: record in table product is present, with Deleted = true Actual outcome: record is missing from table I solved it patching EntityRepository.cs in Nop.Data Diff is attached [EntityRepository_diff.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/17730102/EntityRepository_diff.txt)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7410 Fixed issue with hard-deleted ISoftDeletedEntity items
